name: Adventure's Maze (Shioo4Play)
description:
Adventure's Maze, is a funny and challenger game, were You'll take the rol of Shi, or Lyn two brave heroes, to face the Evil Dr. Evil at his own house.

In Adventure's Maze, you have to avoid traps, overcome obstacles, find important Items, and solve the maze, to pass each level.

The game count with a vast amount of levels, 4 playable charactes, all kind of puzzles, and mazes, and constant skills tests.

Collect the 3 Stars in every level, dont die, and make it all in the shortest time possible, to unlock new characters and higher ranks!

__________________________________________________________________________

This was my first game ever made, and I made it more than 5 years ago.

This is the final version I made at that time, its the full game with the 30 levels.

I am considering re-making this game today, since I have learn so much in this time, that I would love to make the exact same game, but with nicer graphics, and solving all problems and errors this one had.
